emissions.closest_match_explanation: Matched based on Rule 1: Minced beef has similar emissions to 'Beef, mince, 10-15% fat, raw'.
Matched based on Rule 1: Onions are matched to 'Onion, raw' as they are both raw onions.
Matched based on Rule 1: Carrots are matched to 'Carrot, raw' as they are both raw carrots.
Matched based on Rule 1: Celery is matched to 'Celery, raw' as they are both raw celery.
Matched based on Rule 1: Garlic is matched to 'Garlic, raw' as they are both raw garlic.
Matched based on Rule 2 and the 'broader category' example: Fresh basil leaves fall under 'Basil, fresh.'
Matched based on Rule 1: Tomato concentrate is matched to 'Tomato paste, concentrated' as they are both concentrated tomato products.
Matched based on Rule 1: Chopped tomatoes are matched to 'Tomato, peeled, canned' as they are both canned tomatoes.
Matched based on Rule 1: Red wine is matched to 'Wine, red' as they are both red wine.
Matched based on Rule 1: Olive oil is matched to 'Olive oil' as they are both olive oil.
Matched based on Rule 1: Salt is matched to 'Salt, table' as they are both table salt.
Matched based on Rule 1: Pepper is matched to 'Pepper, black' as they are both black pepper.
Matched based on Rule 1: Pasta is matched to 'Pasta, raw' as they are both raw pasta.
Matched based on Rule 1: Grated parmesan is matched to 'Cheese, hard, Parmesan, 32 % fidm.' as they are both Parmesan cheese.
